markdownRemark.html:
Mohammad Abbasi

I am a Backend Developer. I have been actively creating, maintaining, and contributing to the open-source packages
and projects. and implemented many engineering concepts, techniques, and principles in these projects to deliver
high-quality software. I mainly use PHP and Golang to develop web applications and use OOP, SOLID principles, and TDD.
I mostly work with Linux servers, Docker, and Kubernetes clusters, Message brokers, SQL/NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Redis), RESTful APIs, and more.
